channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16286] When TagRewriteCell are not copied to MSLAB, deep clone it while adding to Memstore
item.description: HBASE-16205 missed to handle the case when we add TagRewriteCell to MSLAB. Here we handle that case.
item.summary: When TagRewriteCell are not copied to MSLAB, deep clone it while adding to Memstore

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: TagRewriteCell creation moved to CellUtil and also the class. Added a ShareableMemory verison of TagRewriteCell .
